titleStmt.title: Obedience active and passive due to the supream povver, by the word of God, reason, and the consent of divers moderne and orthodox divines; written not out of faction, but conscience, and with desire to informe the ignorant, and undeceive the seduced: by W.J. a welwiller to peace and truth.
titleStmt.author: W. J., welwiller to peace and truth.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Leonard Litchfeild, Printer to the Vniversity,

notesStmt.note: "A treatise printed in London with a counterfeit Oxford imprint" -- Madan.
Running title reads: The subjects duty to their lawfull king.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
